text: Zimne Wody () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lewin Kłodzki, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-east of Lewin Kłodzki, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Zimne Wody
title: Zimne Wody
